isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - ECM SELF DIAGNOSTICS - SIGNAL FUNCTIONS

svcproc.title: SIGNAL FUNCTIONS
svcproc.para: The Electronic Control Module (ECM) monitors and controls engine/vehicle operation and performance, enables vehicle features such as PTO and cruise control to function, communicates engine/vehicle information to the instrument cluster, transmission (on vehicles equipped with electronically controlled transmissions) and diagnostic/programming tools.
